api_list.name: List of airports by coordinate within 500km radius
api_list.description: List of airports available within coordinate in 500km radius.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://airports-worldwide.p.rapidapi.com/get_airports/-36.8530/174.7741"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "airports-worldwide.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://airports-worldwide.p.rapidapi.com/get_airports/{latitude}/{longitude}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "airports-worldwide.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
